metadata.description:
# Bruce
Artist: Marc Hemeon
Number: 1/13
Token: #1

------

## GachaGacha Art
Inspired by Gachapon capsule machines, Gacha Gacha ART series 1 is a fun way to collect unique art on the blockchain by amazing established and emerging artists from around the world! You'll be surprised and excited about your new NFT-based art piece, whether it's the one you were hoping for or not. The Gacha Gacha ART community offers a way to trade and sell your pieces to get all of the ones you want. Good luck!

Visit Gachapon.xyz
